original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at Rs316.00/322.00 to US dollar, bonds down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee was quoted at 316.00/322.00 to the US dollar in morning trade, Thursday dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 310.00/315.00 rupees on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 22.50/22.80 down from 22.70/22.90 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 23.75/24.25 percent steady from 23.80/24.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 25.50 down from 25.90/26.20 percent. (Colombo/June15/2023)
